did.abstract: Advertising executive based in New York; partner in several different agencies over time. Collection consists of two case studies, for ESPN and Tommy Hilfiger's Murjani campaign. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Advertising executive based in New York; partner in several different agencies over time. Born 1931 New York. U.S. Army Discharge 1954; CBS 1954; Lennen & Newell 1957; Sudler & Hennessey 1957; Doyle Dane Bernbach 1959; Papert Koenig Lois 1960; Lois Holland Callaway 1967; Creamer Lois 1977; Lois Pitts Gershon 1978; Lois/GGK 1985; Lois/USA 1991.
